title: Bella Thorne shuts down a Six Flags amusement park for 22nd birthday bash
text:
Bella Thorne pulled out the stops for her latest birthday bash.

The 22-year-old actress fired up her Insta Stories on Tuesday night and revealed that Six Flags Magic Mountain was shut down for her party.

Her guest list at the fete included Patrick Schwarzenegger, who made his film debut opposite Bella in last year's movie Midnight Sun.

Pulling out the stops: Bella Thorne fired up her Insta Stories on Tuesday night and revealed that Six Flags Magic Mountain was shut down for her party

Bella filmed herself wearing a Chanel T-shirt in the car and singing: 'Guess who's motherf***ing shutting down Six Flags. Me!'

The actress was treated to a Chanel-designed cake that was topped with a figurine of a dancing woman in a red split skirt.

As the birthday girl pointed out, the figurine was holding a copy of Bella's poetry book The Life Of A Wannabe Mogul: Mental Disarray, published this July.

Party time: Her guest list at the party included Patrick Schwarzenegger, who made his film debut opposite Bella in last year's flop Midnight Sun

Feeling fab: Bella filmed herself wearing a Chanel tee in the car and singing: 'Guess who's motherf***ing shutting down Six Flags

He made it: Her Midnight Sun co-star Patrick Schwarzenegger, seen here in NY in September, also made the party

She also used social media to show off a luxurious Chanel bag she got as a present from her singer boyfriend Benjamin Mascolo.

Bella earlier revealed on her Insta Stories that Benjamin had also gifted her a massive portrait of her scrawled with typescript.

The former child star is in an open relationship with Benjamin and also carrying on a romance with a woman named Alex Martini.

Chic: The actress was treated to a Chanel-designed cake that was topped with a figurine of a dancing woman in a red split skirt

Plug: As the birthday girl pointed out, the figurine was holding a copy of Bella's poetry book The Life Of A Wannabe Mogul: Mental Disarray, published this July

When Bella posted an Instagram snap of herself cuddling Alex on Monday, Benjamin commented: 'You girls are cute'.

Bella is no stranger to doubling up her love interests, having concurrently dated 32-year-old rapper Mod Sun and online model Tana Mongeau.

Tana, who is now reportedly married to vlog hunk Jake Paul, also left a warm comment on Bella's cuddling photo with Alex, writing: 'yes martini!'
description: The 22-year-old fired up her Insta Stories on Tuesday night and revealed that Six Flags Magic Mountain was shut down for her party.
